metadata.description:
over the last year i’ve probably been on the worst sleep schedule of my life. it’s definitely made the days harder than they need to be, but for good reason, i haven’t been able to fix it. this song is one of the many that’s kept me up at night. i started writing this one at 4am back in april while my roommate was dead asleep. i had my acoustic guitar out and two chords recorded using the mic built into my macbook. i wrote/recorded all the verses within a few minutes. it honestly came together way too quickly and way too imperfectly perfect. i then spent the entire next day (after waking up at 1pm of course) producing out the entire song and constantly thinking to myself “wow this is so sad but so sick”
this song is so simple, yet so special and you’ll feel it when listening.
hope you dig <3

written by Peter Saputo
produced by Peter Saputo
mixed by Yianni Anastos-Prastacos
mastered by Théo Quayle

lyrics.text:
i’m all alone, 
in my bed
rather be with you instead

feel like a wreck,
wish you were here 
to kiss my neck

i see your stories 
you look like you’re doing fine
i hope you're happy, but not without me
i wanna believe that you still wanna keep me, 
yeah i hope you're happy, just not without me 

so how you been, 
you coming back?
kinda miss your presence

do you think of me?
at your best, 
when you’re trying to forget?

i see your stories 
you look like you’re doing fine
i hope you're happy, but not without me
i wanna believe that you still wanna keep me, 
yeah i hope you're happy, just not without me 

wish you the best, hope you're content
kinda wish you hadn’t left

metadata.name: at your best #1
metadata.title: at your best
